body:
Due to the logic in configure.ac, we may be using both the system linker (`LD_RO='ld -r -o'`) and the linker tied to the compiler (`LD=$CXX`). This may produce weird link-time errors when the two executables are not the same.

The PR works around the issue by saying LD_RO does not exist.
title: plumed: fixed possible linking issue
